item.title: HiOCFD5 Vortex Transport
item.description: Case Description This case is from the 5th International Workshop on High Order CFD Methods. Check its description from this webpage. This basic case is aimed at testing a high-order method’s capability to preserve vorticity in an unsteady inviscid flow. Results NFS employs SSP-RK3 as the time marching scheme. It runs 25 periods of time to test the accuracy. The $L_2$ error is in terms of the streamwise velocity.
